title: WANTED: Brown Hindu "Portraits" ... Cy Young and Walter Johnson {Trade Chips Inside}
author: DerekMichael

posts.post_title: WANTED: Brown Hindu "Portraits" ... Cy Young and Walter Johnson {Trade Chips Inside}
posts.post_content:
Hello fellow net54 members.

I am interested in adding a couple of new pieces to my T206 collection, and felt it could be fruitful to explore options on this forum, as it does attract a lot of die hards, and at the very least, it typically offers pleasant conversation with fellow collectors.

What I covet are Brown Hindu portraits of Cy Young and Walter Johnson. While I realize that these are combinations which no one is likely to want to part with, I have assembled what I believe are interesting trade pieces, and I would love to discuss a potential deal with anyone who may be interested.

A few of the pieces which can be used to construct a trade, all of which possess a pleasing eye appeal, in my humble opinion:

Lenox

Al Bridwell "Portrait- With Cap" ... PSA 2


CAROLINA BRIGHTS

Roger Bresnahan (HOF) "Holding Bat" ... SGC 4.5 and PSA 2


BROWN HINDU

Rube Waddell (HOF) "Portrait" ... SGC 1.5 (formerly PSA 1)
Fred Merkle ... SGC 2
Fred Clarke (HOF) "With Bat" ... SGC A


AMERICAN BEAUTY 

Hughie Jennings (HOF) "Both Hands" {AB 460}
Zack Wheat (HOF) {AB 460} ... PSA 3
Orval Overall "Hands At Face" {AB 460} ... SGC 1.5
Sam Crawford (HOF) "With Bat" {AB 350 - No Frame} ... SGC 3
Miller Huggins (HOF) "Hands At Mouth" {AB 350 - Framed} ... PSA 3


EL PRINCIPE DE GALES

Frank Bowerman *** F. Scott Fitzgerald Stamp ***
Chief Bender (HOF) "Portrait" ... SGC 3
Hal Chase "Portrait - Blue" ... PSA 4
Addie Joss (HOF) "Hands At Chest" ... SGC 1
Jimmy Collins (HOF) ... SGC 1.5
Nap Rucker "Portrait" ... PSA 3


TOLSTOI

Miller Huggins (HOF) "Hands At Mouth" ... PSA 3


CYCLE 350

Matty McIntyre ... SGC 5


"Common" Backs

Tris Speaker (HOF) ... SGC 5.5
Willie Keeler (HOF) "Portrait" ... SGC 3
Hal Chase "Portrait - Pink" ... SGC 2


The above are examples of pieces which can be included, and if some cash is required, this is fine as well. Scans are available upon request, though a select few will not be available for the next few days, as they are currently in transit.

I greatly appreciate your time.

Thank you.

Derek
